data.text: Mazɔlɔɔ è taa wolai ɠɛa ga kɔtu ziɠigiti,
Naa ɠa é ba, zobobɛ nuɓusɛiti ta è lɛbi,
Mazɔlɔɔ è ɠɛni ga bala nuiti dɔɔɠuzuʋɛ,
ɓaa eɠɛ foloi ma lie golai é loozu zou vɔɔi zu.
Siyɔn gizei nii ma ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii
Náʋɛ ɠa é gɔlɔ zeɠei ɠoloɠolosu ná,
Toɠa saa vai ɓe eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Toɠa wo naama volo ná ga:
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yee ʋagɔi ɠa laani gizei tɛi ma.
Toɠa yeemaaɠɔ kaʋa ʋili zeɠei zu,
